items.properties: which is a natural number since the sum of two natural numbers is another natural number

items.claim: Since S = E + O can be expressed as 2*k + 1 for some natural number k, it is an odd number. Therefore, the sum of an even natural number and an odd natural number is an odd natural number.

document.claim: The sum of an even natural number and an odd natural number is an odd natural number.
